channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Tiny electric motor can produce more than 1,000 horsepower
item.description:
SBX CARS – View live supercar auctions powered by Supercar Blondie This tiny electric motor can produce more than 1,000 horsepower The new YASA axial flux motor weighs just 28 pounds, or about the same as a small dog. This makes the current electric motor 40 percent better than the previous edition. YASA YASA already produces motors for many expensive cars That’s a big deal for EVs.

Read more

item.title: Update and shut down no longer restarts PC, 25H2 patch addresses decades-old bug
item.description:
Home Windows 11 Windows 11 Starting with Windows 11 25H2 Build 26200. Now, IT admins are going mad November 1, 2025 First look at how Copilot will change Windows 11 taskbar search November 1, 2025 Microsoft confirms Windows 11 Task Manager bug is potentially degrading performance November 1, 2025 Windows 10 Windows 11 Media Creation Tool works again on Windows 10, downloads Windows 11 25H2 Build 26200. 6899 Mayank Parmar - October 31, 2025 0 AMD confirms it’s not ending Windows 10 support, says Windows 11 installer will work on Windows 10 October 31, 2025 Can you still bypass Windows 11 requirements as Windows 10 hits EOL.

Read more
